errormessages.addressnopobox: %%fieldname%% must not be a P.O. box.
errormessages.alphanumericonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters and numbers.
errormessages.alphanumericspaceonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters, numbers and spaces.
errormessages.alphaspaceonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters and spaces.
errormessages.bankroutingbadformat: %%fieldname%% is not a valid routing number.
errormessages.birthdatetooold: %%fieldname%% must be no more than %%maximum%% years of age.
errormessages.birthdatetooyoung: %%fieldname%% must be at least %%minimum%% years of age.
errormessages.cardnumberbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid credit card number.
errormessages.ccdateinvalid: %%fieldname%% is not a valid credit card expiration date.
errormessages.counttoofew: At least one %%fieldname%% must be entered.
errormessages.currencybadformat: %%fieldname%% must contain a valid amount of money.
errormessages.currencyonly: %%fieldname%% must be a valid currency amount.
errormessages.datefutureonly: %%fieldname%% must specify a date in the future.
errormessages.dateinvalid: %%fieldname%% is invalid; the day must be between %%minimum%% and %%maximum%%.
errormessages.datepastonly: %%fieldname%% must specify a date in the past.
errormessages.daterangeinvalid: The selected date range is invalid.
errormessages.decimalonly: %%fieldname%% must be a valid decimal amount.
errormessages.discoverbadfmt: %%fieldname%% must be a valid Discover card number.
errormessages.emailbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid e-mail address.
errormessages.embosscharsonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters, numbers, dashes, and spaces.
errormessages.general: There was an error completing your request.
errormessages.greaterthanorequal: %%fieldname1%% must be greater than or equal to %%fieldname2%%.
errormessages.hexcolorbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid hex color.
errormessages.mastercardbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid MasterCard card number.
errormessages.passwordcharsonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters, numbers, or the symbols _ * $ @ ! # + -
errormessages.passwordfirstchar: %%fieldname%% must start with a letter or number.
errormessages.pci_password_change_message: Password cannot match any of your 4 previous passwords, or any password used in the last 30 days.
errormessages.pci_password_message: Password must be at least 8 characters and must contain at least 1 upper case character, 1 lower case character, and 1 numeric digit.
errormessages.phonebadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid Phone Number.
errormessages.securityanswerbad: The security answer you provided does not match our records. Please review your answer and try again.
errormessages.ssnbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid Social Security Number.
errormessages.usernamecharsonly: %%fieldname%% must contain only letters, numbers, or the symbols _ * $ @ ! # + -
errormessages.usernamefirstchar: %%fieldname%% must start with a letter or number.
errormessages.usphonebadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid US phone number.
errormessages.uszipbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid US ZIP code.
errormessages.visabadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid Visa card number.
errormessages.visamcbadformat: %%fieldname%% must be a valid Visa or MasterCard card number.
